data.body: Create src/lib/registry-api.ts with client fetch wrappers (fetchRegistry, addRepoToRegistry, removeRepoFromRegistry, browseDirectory). Modify src/lib/api.ts to add repo param to all functions + fetchBeadsFromAllRepos aggregation. Modify src/stores/app-store.ts to add activeRepo and registeredRepos state.
data.description: Create src/lib/registry-api.ts with client fetch wrappers (fetchRegistry, addRepoToRegistry, removeRepoFromRegistry, browseDirectory). Modify src/lib/api.ts to add repo param to all functions + fetchBeadsFromAllRepos aggregation. Modify src/stores/app-store.ts to add activeRepo and registeredRepos state.
data.title: Client-side registry API and store
